title: Ticket #342: Streaming I/O does not function on Windows
description: It appears that streaming I/O does not function on Windows. An account from NMI puts the first occurrence of the service not functioning at version 6.7.18, but it may have not worked for much longer than this, as the comment that mentioned it was only put in place after the first time NMI started testing streaming I/O on Windows.
derived_tickets: #353   Fix streaming of input, output, etc. on Windows
creator: burnett
